"Preset Abilities":
"On rare occasion, weapons and armor dropped from enemies will have a Special Ability with a special effect, called a Preset Ability.

Unlike normal Special Abilities, Preset Abilities cannot be added or combined at the Item Lab."

"プリセット能力を追加するには、
素材としてプリセット能力がついた武器または防具と、
素材アイテム、N-メセタが必要です。"
